name: Super Mario Bros. 2
description: The remake of Super Mario Bros. 2 included in Super Mario Advance.

name: Super Mario World
description:
The remake of Super Mario World included in Super Mario Advance 2 for the Game Boy Advance. In this refreshed version for the portable system, you can choose to play as either Mario or Luigi in single player.

If you've played the original, you'll find that Mario controls much the same as the Super Nintendo counterpart, but his brother Luigi can jump a bit higher and float a short while, and Luigi's fireballs will bounce higher as well.

Saving in this game is available at any point during game, either on the overworld or inside of a level.

name: Jewelry Master Twinkle
description: Xbox Live indie puzzle game.

name: The Lamplighters League: Nocturne
description: Fight darkness with darkness by adding the mysterious Nocturne to your league, a macabre spectrophysicist marooned in an alternate dimension, who returned forever altered. Nocturne manipulates her body’s electric field to inflict Shock Damage on her enemies while also supercharging her cutting-edge suit to enhance her abilities. Count yourself lucky that this mysterious skirmisher is on your side - now you see her, now you’re dead!

name: Koron de Jump!!

name: Super Mario Bros. 3
description: The remake of Super Mario Bros. 3 included in Super Mario Advance 4.

name: Cycle Scramble
description: Race as some wacky characters as you try to become the champion!

name: D.C.5: Da Capo 5
description:
Kagamijima, an island closest to the sky.

Along with the Lake Mikagami waters that reflects the sky like mirror on it's waters, lies a soaring sakura tree in Kagami Gakuen.

Kujou Souma, who attends Kagami Gakuen.
Yasaka Menoa, his queen-like undesired unseparable childhood friend.
Tokisaka Yukina, big sister figure who is the student council president.
Shirawaka Akari, far-beyond-reach ojousama.
Yasaka Kako, Menoa's younger sister who calls Souma big brother.
Suginami, mysterious well-informed friend.
Together, they live a merry fun school life.

On Kagami Gakuen, stands a curious sakura tree called "Hakari no Sakura". It has the ability to help collect student's consensus on choices. Students choose to wear white or black cape on their uniforms, then Hakari no Sakura aggregates the amount of wearer to choose the majority. The latest choose event (called Hakarigoto), student has to decide whether the next school festival would be a cultural festival or sports festival. They get to promote and win sides on whichever festival they feel is the best to enjoy. It's a natural occurence whenever Hakarigoto happens.

Then one day.
Souma visited Lake Mikagami, there's "another sakura tree" whom has never bloom in so many years, blooms dazzlingly.
Looking up to the sky, along with the blooming petals, a young girl decends.

"Yes, you are....", whispers the mystery girl, Sakuragi Mizuha.

Meetings of the boys and girls, the fate begins to move.

While out-of-season sakura blooms, curtain to young boys and girls story opens.

name: Deep Rock Galactic: Rogue Core
description: DEEP ROCK GALACTIC: ROGUE CORE is a 1-4 player co-op FPS roguelite featuring 100% destructible environments and procedurally-generated caves. Join a team of dwarven Reclaimers tasked with reestablishing control over lost deep mining operations on Hoxxes IV.

name: Cycle Scramble 2
description: Cycle Scramble is back for more wacky fun! Race against opponents across wild tracks, trying to meet objectives to unlock new crazy characters and earn money for upgrades.

name: Boobytales
description: A doujin 1v1 fighting game featuring several animal characters, created with 2D Fighter Maker '95. The version available online is labelled "Test Version +", but is unfinished. Most of the fighters are playable, but some (Byufero, Tarshow & Need) are unfinished.

name: Thrall
description: To be enthralled by love is murder on the soul in this paranormal, point-and-click, otome visual novel.

name: Long Time No See
description: A short, cozy, narrative-driven Halloween game about three friends reuniting to spend a stormy Halloween night together in a haunted house.

name: Today is the End of the World
description:
Today is The End of the World.

And so was yesterday. And the day before. And it will be tomorrow.

Today is The End of the World, and everyone is coming to your backyard tonight to watch it happen. There's just one problem: your best friend Echo is missing, and it is your job to find her.

And tomorrow, she will be missing. And tomorrow, you will find her.

She’ll remember, but you won’t.

Join Tabitha Bones in act 1 of a lighthearted romp through the world's most dysfunctional school!

It's Halloween Spirit Week, and even grumpy Tabbie is ready for some fun. But when her nemesis, Eden (the worst kind of 8th grade boy), steals her thunder, everything goes horribly wrong.

Luckily for her, a magical pixie gives her the power to grab fate and whack the sh*t out of anyone in her way!

description: Air is a Japanese visual novel developed by Key that follows the story of the life of Yukito Kunisaki, a traveling showman searching for the "girl in the sky". He arrives in a quiet, seaside town where he meets three girls, one of whom is the key to the end of his journey. The gameplay in Air follows a branching plot line that offers pre-determined scenarios with courses of interaction and focuses on the appeal of the three female main characters by the player character.

UzeMaze is a port of a game from the Commander X16 retro computer. It started life as the first ever, finished game for the Commander X16, called CX16 Maze.

The point of the game is to color in all the fields of the maze. Once you have chosen a direction, your character will continue moving in that direction until it hits a wall. Your job is to figure out a way to get all the black fields filled in with color.

description:
Survival-horror yuri visual novel.

After a disastrous break up, Qian Hailu wakes up to find that she's dead. Luckily (or unluckily), she's been given a chance to turn back the clock and avert her death—as long as she can pass three rounds in the game of life.

name: Pineapple 64

description: Slow Xbox Live Indie platformer by aorz.

name: MagicalCube
description: MagicalCube is a mission-clear style puzzle game. The object of this game is to defeat monsters in battle by using Marie's magic.

name: Burdock
description:
When you've lost your way and nearly lost your life, will your name be enough to buy it all back?

Burdock is a dark and atmospheric fairytale with fae creatures, riddles, and danger abounding. Will you be able to navigate the perils you face and reclaim your life? Or will the mists swallow you up for good...?

name: Cosmogony: The Complete Collection
description: Cosmogony is a 6 part map pack created by DRey taking place during GLaDOS activation in the Enrichment Center. You are one of the few survivors of the neurotoxin disaster and with some help, you try to find a way out of Aperture. The map pack features custom content, a story deeply immersed in the Portal and Half-Life universe and more.

name: Zombie Raft
description:
Conquer the barren wastelands and defend your raft from zombies!
The apocalypse is upon us! Gather resources, expand your vehicle and find the last survivors who desperately need your help!

Travel across different lands cutting your way through the hordes of zombies. Find people who survived and decide whether to accept them into your group. Assign duties to your members and use your baseball bat to protect them from hungry zombies jumping on the raft!

name: Z Escape
description: Get to the chopper! Pick up the machine gun and destroy all of the zombies to save your crew!

name: Russian Pinocchio
description:
The story of Pinocchio began with the translation of Carlo Collodi's Italian fairy tale Pinocchio, but then developed into a completely different, author Alexei Tolstoy's story. He brought more adventurism and fun to the story and added many new details and changes.

The story was adapted for film, theatrical productions, and the tale itself was published in the USSR 182 times, was translated into 47 languages, and reached a total circulation of 14.5 million copies.

How different is Tolstoy's version from Carlo Collodi's tale, so unique is the graphic version by artist Ekaterina Volzhina! She retains Tolstoy's entire plot, but brings it to modern Russia! Her story is told without a single word, but with incredibly beautiful illustrations and love for the source material.

name: Animal Kart Racer 2
description: Three, two, one - Step on it! Anything goes in these races: Risky overtaking manoeuvres, shameless crashes and insane pile-ups. Hurtle through deep gorges, glittering diamond caves, icy polar regions and yawning canyons.

name: Arcade Archives: Darius II
description: Sample tuna sashimi in 3 screen glory!

name: Halloween Bubble Shooter
description: Halloween Bubble Shooter is a spooky bubble shooter game for all ages.

name: Steampunk Voyage
description: Gather you Jetpacks and your sense of spirit for adventure and embark on this mystical journey of steampunk!

name: The Chase: Cop Pursuit
description:
The Chase is finally here. A thrilling and action-packed game that will have your heart racing! Prepare to unleash your inner speed monster as you take on the role of a driver who is being chased by the cops.

It's a challenging game in which you'll be immersed in a world of powered car races and exciting driving. Take control of a variety of customized cars and abilities, each with its own unique characteristics, and overcome your pursuers with your expert driving abilities. Explore smoothly created maps inspired by Eastern culture to give your escape ways a unique touch.

As you race through the maps you will come across power-ups that can give you a significant advantage in your daring escape. Keep an eye out for NOS to boost your car's speed and leave your pursuers in the dust. Additionally, strategically deploying mines can slow down police cars in order to earn victory.

Prepare to be on the edge of your seat with a captivating storyline that immerses you in danger, Can you escape the police? Prove your strength as an escape artist. Unlock additional characters to enrich your gameplay.

name: Alien Returns
description: Sin descripción

name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Hinokami Chronicles: Ultimate Edition
description:
Ultimate Edition Content:
Includes base game, all Digital Deluxe content, and all Character Pass content.

name: Supreme Car Parking Simulator 2024
description: At the disposal of the player there is a garage with different cars, which he can acquire during the game. The player has to complete many missions.

name: Shadows of Truth
description: Unravel a plot in New York, play as two detectives who fight to find the truth.

name: Gungrave G.O.R.E: Ultimate Enhanced Edition
description: Unique third-person shooter action game just made comeback to Nintendo Switch. Become Grave, a resurrected gunslinger and ruthless anti-hero, and rain down bullets on your enemies.

name: Wings
description: Skilled and fun flying!

name: Umbrella Drop
description: Use umbrellas to slow your fall

name: Taxi Driver Simulator 2024
description: Taxi Driver Simulator 2024 is a type of taxi simulator. The player will play the role of a taxi driver who worked for so long that he became a millionaire. Now he works as a taxi driver for fun. The game has realistic graphics that give you the feeling of being in the scene where the action takes place. The game features a garage with luxury cars that the player can purchase after accumulating enough currency. The game has an open world and is intended for people loving simulator games.

name: Hyper Gym Life 3D: Tough Guys
description: Take the first step towards the pinnacle of the fitness world and good health!

name: Trapped in The Tricky Prison
description: The prison is full of tricks. Seek many rooms to find cues for getaway. Can you get out?

name: Master of The Secret Sea
description: Hire a crew, trade goods, and engage in classic sea battles to build your reputation as the captain of a pirate ship.

name: Madou Monogatari: Fia to Fushigi na Gakkou
description:
An ancient school of sorcery. Where students study true magic and cultivate their ambitions.

Fia, a girl who aims to be a great sorcerer, leaves her hometown and enrolls in an ancient school of sorcery once attended by her grandmother in order to study sorcery.

Surrounded by strict but humorous instructors, and chaotic but amusing classmates, Fia will study sorcery and develop her abilities.

name: Ground Wars KDR
description: Dive headfirst into the classic era of first-person and third person shooters with "Ground Wars KDR Alpha". Immerse yourself in the heart-pounding action and diverse arsenal that defined the early days of FPS gaming. Engage in awesome multiplayer mayhem across multiple maps.

name: Blob Life
description: This Cute Sidescroller RPG is all about taking care of little aliens called blobs! Give them unique names, check their vitals, build colorful houses, play and feed them with a variety of sweets when you have all the time in the world.

name: Monkey Game
description: Platformer Adventure game, get your monkey to the end whilst fighting enemy monkeys and bosses and unlock new stages.

name: Soul Stitcher
description: Explore the deepest Dungeons in this thrilling roguelike action game. Collect souls in the name of the evil God. Fall and come back again and again because it's your destiny to serve for eternity. Stay alive in these challenging missions, or die and rise for more!

name: Berzerk: Recharged
description: Blast your way through an endless maze inhabited by deadly robots and their invulnerable, menacing master Evil Otto. Tag in a friend in local co-op to help you survive this twin-stick revival of an arcade classic.

name: Stellar Ghosts Settlers
description: Stellar Ghosts Settlers is a Sci Fi Fantasy 3rd person action shooter game. Chose amongst 6 of the playable characters to go through the missions or the arenas. Kill as many enemies as you can to earn even more credits to update your favorite character(s).

name: Hellheim: A Norse Saga
description: Hellheim: A Norse Saga is a gripping first-person action game that takes you on an immersive journey through the depths of Norse mythology. Step into the role of Einar, a battle-hardened Danish warrior, as you traverse the treacherous realm of Helheim in search of redemption and freedom.

name: Pixel of Memory
description: Pixel of Memory is a wholesome minimalist puzzle game about an amnesiac painter piecing himself back together through his childhood mementos.

name: Sticker Kittens
description: Sticker Kittens is a sudoku-like puzzle where you need to match kittens. You can also learn about how to raise and play with kittens!

name: Devil Seeds
description: Explore a ghost island dominated by mystical creatures. This game offers an experience that mixes horror and RPG, allowing you to explore every dark corner, solving puzzles, finding files and meeting strange characters.

name: Lost Meridian
description: 3D Deckbuilding game where you craft your perfect deck to survive the dungeons. Online co-op support with up to 4 friends.

name: Codename Incubus
description: Slice, dash, and parry your way through your inner demons in this fast-paced psychedelic journey! Dodge an onslaught of deadly projectiles and unleash your blade upon nightmarish foes that lurk within your subconscious. Follow a dissident dealer and a jaded philanderer on their never-ending trip.

name: Boots and Daggers
description: How much coin can you grab before time runs out?

name: The Hamster's Journey
description: The Hamster's Journey is a roguelite platformer in which you guide Hammy Jo through the exciting cage escape of his dreams. Don hats and pants to imbue Hammy Jo with unique types of movement, and combine these powers in clever ways to overcome the obstacles strewn in your way.

name: Ghost Seeker Hunter Simulation
description: Immerse yourself in the dark world of Ghost Seeker - Hunter Simulation, an exciting supernatural adventure. Take on the role of a ghost hunter, exploring abandoned houses in search of spirits. Uncover the secrets of the paranormal, confront your fears, and become a true ghost hunter.

name: All-Ways Up
description: Dive into a world where the ground betrays and the only way is up. "AllWaysUp" is a thrilling Jump and Run adventure set against a backdrop of mystery: why must humanity constantly ascend? Master your moves, uncover the story, and support our main game's journey with every leap you take.

name: Avant-Garde
description: Avant-Garde is a game reenacting historical battles in real time in which you must face the same conditions and resources available at the time. Take place as the leader of either army, simulate, understand and challenge history through authentic battles!

name: Paddle Protectors
description: Build your colony. Establish defense lines, trenches and fortifications.

name: Freestyle Ice Skater
description: Freestyle Ice Skater is a casual action/sports game. Your goal is to join the local group of freestyle ice skaters, master your tricks and beat the rival team in an epic freestyle battle.

name: Platform War
description: Platform War is a turn-based shooter in which you make soldiers fight against each other on 15 different platforms. You can choose between 7 different units that all have their own weapons. Earn experience, in order to get promoted to a higher grade, where you can use other weapons.

name: Matsurika no Kei: Tenmeiin Iden
description:
“This is an ancient melody without a reciter.”

Chinese-style high fantasy x glittering romance.

name: Dredge: The Pale Reach
description:
The Pale Reach is the first official expansion for Dredge - a cosmic horror fishing adventure with a sinister undercurrent. This content adds a brand new, ice-themed biome that can be experienced at any stage in your playthrough.

In The Pale Reach, you’ll navigate the treacherous ice fields to discover a mystery frozen under the ice. Retrace the steps of the last crew that came before you and unearth a story of bitter betrayal. Find some familiar faces and develop new equipment to navigate the area and profit from its inhabitants.

name: Xaxa Machine
description: A video drug-like CD-ROM by Hideki Nakazawa, a leading expert in stupid CG. It's like watching the psychedelic screen move with a uni-uni, but this CD-ROM has a stupid mode that allows the poop to uni-uni and play with a special stupid brush.

name: Sniper Team 2
description:
Sniper Team 2 is the sequel to the classic Sniper Team game. Gather up your squad and defend the objective from the enemy in this first-person action game. Sniper Team 2 features a 10-mission campaign, spread across a few different maps and locations, and a separate Spec Ops game mode that unlocks after you’ve beaten the game. So no matter what you’re doing, you’re in for a sniping good time.

Each mission puts you into the shoes of four different soldiers, each positioned in a different part of the map. You can cycle between them for the best vantage point on the enemies. In the later levels, you’ll be switching between them constantly.

name: Derpixon x FNF
description: Derpixon x FNF is a pornographic mod for Friday Night Funkin'.

name: Friday Night Fever: Frenzy
description: You're Fever, the mayor of Fever Town! A trip back from space caused you to crash here instead of home, and things began to pile up on your desk ever since. Once an abandoned spot on the map, it's now a hot spot for the world's rejects, criminals, scumbags and any others shunned from their homes. Your girlfriend is also from space, and you're hiding some dark secrets from her... can you handle a relationship as well as you can handle being a mayor?

name: Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals - Yandere Simulator
description: Yandere Simulator was the third crossover chapter for Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals.

name: Steam Droid
description: Liberate the steam droids over 14 levels and take on the final big boss. Use different weapons and bonuses to become stronger.

name: Ayano's Lovesick Labyrinth
description: Ayano's Lovesick Labyrinth is a cancelled crossover spinoff game between Dark Deception and Yandere Simulator. The game was cancelled in September 2023 due to controversy relating to YandereDev.

name: Tribes & Monsters
description: Tribes and Monsters is a survivor-like game where you can choose a tribe and become the leader of your own army. Try to collect materials in worlds inhabited by vicious monsters. Craft, upgrade, and enhance your tribe's base to unlock more features, stronger weapons, pets and so much more!

name: Guardian Maia
description: Guardian Maia is a 3rd person action-adventure game set in 2750 where the world of science fiction and traditional Indigenous Māori culture collide. Journey across New Zealand’s unforgiving South Island fighting ruthless warriors to find three kete (baskets) which hold the key to saving your people.

name: Dr. Psycho: Hospital Escape 2
description: Experience your deepest fears within the frightening walls of Dr. Psycho's Hospital. Is this gloomy asylum the result of your own tormented mind? Go through blood-chilling challenges, find hidden items and face terrifying psychopaths. Will you escape this nightmare or become its eternal prisoner?

name: Tales of Anturia: Hejstos
description: Survive in the harsh world of Hejstos. Build a camp, defend it against orcs and other threats. And if you feel strong enough, discover the secret, hidden in the mountains and save your homeland from civil war.

name: Haunted House Builder
description: Build a haunted house and scare some guests.

name: Neuralgia
description: Assume the role of Blake Jensen, the CEO of Creative Edge, a renowned company known for its groundbreaking innovations. You unknowingly stumble upon a sinister plot of revenge. Jeffrey Howes, a former employee you sacked, nurses a deep-seated grudge against you.

name: Farmer Survivors
description: Welcome to Farmer Survivors, where you'll embark on an epic rural adventure, defending your farm against hordes of hungry insects in this action-packed Arcade Survivor game!

name: Captured Nightmare
description: It follows the story of a young man who ends up involved in a dark adventure, where he will seek to unravel his family tree, during his journey he will find more questions than answers. But be careful! You only have one life, if you lose, you start from zero. Do you accept this challenge?

name: Merchant's Odyssey
description: Step into the shoes of a young merchant on a journey where you'll trade goods, recruit a diverse array of mercenaries, engage in tactical combat, and make critical decisions that shape both your path and the unfolding story.

name: Editarrr
description: Challenge yourself and your friends in this pixel-perfect pirate platformer! Create your own levels and compete for swashbuckling supremacy on the global leaderboards.

name: Mutant Frog
description: As a result of an unknown meteorite hitting an unknown planet, a poisonous gas began to spread on the planet. This gas began to mutate animals on the planet.

name: Ridevery
description: In the game you have to become the fastest and most reliable pizza delivery guy, conquering realistic city streets on your high-speed scooter.

name: Super Mega Awesome Typing
description: Unleash your inner typing maestro in SUPER MEGA AWESOME TYPING! Epic music, neon vibes, achievements! Get ready to tap to the beat and upskill your typing to BEAST MODE. The only limit is yourself!

name: A Hero's Legacy
description: Lenz is a kind and charismatic young man who will embark on this fantasy journey in a vast world, full of incredible adventures to explore, and several secrets to uncover!

name: Mistward
description: Mistward is a survival city-builder set on a mysterious island enshrouded in a poisonous mist! Create light sources to keep the mist at bay, build houses and command humans to gather resources. Explore the island and find a way out!

name: Halloween Survivors
description: Halloween brings all of your worst nightmares to life! Slaughter hordes of Halloween slashers, monsters, demons, and cosmic horrors! This Halloween, experience the ultimate bullet-heaven gameplay in... HELL!!!

name: Cat Search in The Wild West
description: 105 Cats are hiding in this old western town! Can you find them all?

name: Clone Knights
description: Clone Knights is a platform game. Navigate across various platforms using high jumps and get to the end of the level to get to the next, much more difficult one. Lead your army to victory and watch your step, sire.

name: Autumn's Bounty
description: Find your friends, save your potluck.

name: Cozy Desert
description: Embark on a heartwarming journey through the enchanting world of Cozy Desert, a delightful and charming exploration game that will warm your soul and captivate your imagination. Step into a whimsical desert village, where the sands hold secrets waiting to be uncovered.

name: The Masquerade
description: The Masquerade is a murder party game from 2 to 8 players. Impersonate NPCs to hide from your stalker, while gathering enough clues to unmask your target.

name: Trade Disturbance
description: Trade Disturbance is a hidden object game. Use a free overview of different zones and find the required things from the list to complete the level. The game uses your memory and attention to detail well.

name: Xenoterrestrial
description: Time and date are not important. Aliens have boarded a military vessel deep in space. Little do they know, #T217, a combat clone onboard the dreadnought, has been waiting for them. Use a wealth of weapons and mechanics to eliminate them with expert precision.

name: Neon City Climbing Simulator
description: Climb tall buildings with Neon City Climbing Simulator! Prepare for an adrenaline-filled adventure with excitement, realistic graphics, and challenging missions.

name: Arthur & Susan: Almost Detectives
description: Arthur and Susan, two inseparable friends solving mysteries together. Fun and cozy indie point&click. Don't miss it!

name: Himiko's Journey
description: Embark on an epic adventure, where every card you play, every decision you make, and every roll of the dice shapes your destiny. Will you conquer the challenges that lie ahead and emerge victorious on "Himiko's Journey"?

name: Faye Freelance: Rebel Reporter
description: Faye Freelance: Rebel Reporter is a brand new NEWSVANIA that combines the nostalgic charm of pixel platformers with the spirit of Journalism in a stylish twist. Face your foes not with guns and blades, but with pen and ink! Featuring stylized pixel-art aesthetic and hand-crafted animation.

name: Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals - UK Creators
description: UK Creators is the 2.5nd chapter of Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals.

name: Echoes of Madness
description: With innovative gameplay mechanics in this genre, a story that immerses you in the depths of unimaginable horrors, and an immersive visual and auditory setting, Echoes of Madness represents the revival of this subgenre forgotten through time. Will you be able to survive your shift?

name: Augmented Brutality
description: Augmented Brutality is a lightning fast, hyperviolent top-down shooter in a nightmarish techno-industrial setting. Shoot, dismember, head-stomp and door-kick your way through dozens of handcrafted levels using any edge you can find to tilt the impossible odds to your favor. It's time to get bloody.

name: Reverse Dungeon
description: Make yourself a keeper of an ancient tomb. Protect your treasure from pesky heroes in any way you can — set traps, create cliffs, make surfaces slippery. Or let your friends become adventurers and show them the full power of the Reverse Dungeon!

name: Chained Cucumber
description: Chained bean is action game with little bit of horror element , where your enemy is very bouncy.

name: Cryptical Path
description: Cryptical Path is a thrilling rogue-lite dungeon crawler that pushes the boundaries of the genre. Play the Architect, build your own path, and navigate an ever-changing labyrinth you've been summoned in.

name: Power Line Rider
description: Power Line Rider is an Action-Packed Endless Runner with retro 8-bit inspired graphics & sounds! Dodge Birds, Squirrels, Monkeys and Fight Bosses as you race across a post-apocalyptic world where the fastest means of travel is riding on old Power Lines!

name: Dealer Simulator
description: Dealer Simulator invites you to a world where your bargaining skills will be tested to the limits, and you'll never know what lies behind each door. Are you ready to become a top-tier trader? Join the warehouse adventure with Dealer Simulator!

name: Reaplaced
description: A supernatural Halloween whodunnit. Solve a chilling locked-room mystery before the grim reaper reveals the answer!

name: The Shopping Dead
description: In The Shopping Dead, brave the undead-infested aisles in this 2D arcade frenzy! Memorize lists, dodge zombies, and gather items under pressure. Earn currency, buy power-ups, and outshop the apocalypse. Will your reflexes make the checkout, or will you be left behind?

name: The Last Bot
description: Play as a lone robot exploring a post-human world where nature has overtaken cities of towering skyscrapers. Unearth the forgotten legacy of your creators by reviving your sole companions - long dormant, malfunctioning robots - each holding a key to both the past and humanity's fate.

name: Dinolords
description: Dinolords is a realtime strategy game where you gather resources, build fortifications and command units in defence against the invading Danes with their arsenal of fierce dinosaurs. A shocking new age in medieval warfare.

name: Witches' Hallow
description: Witches' Hallow is a top-down arena game where you fight against hordes of creatures as a witch who can use up to 5 weapons. Choose one of the witches, develop her as you wish and explore 3 different spooky areas! Don't forget to stay alive while doing this!

name: Kids Land
description: Educational or casual puzzle games for children and adults

name: Sekala
description: Experience a gripping narrative journey in this survival horror hack-and-slash adventure. Follow Kala, a college student trapped in a trauma related to death, as he tries to survive encounters with morbid creatures.

name: John Novak
description: Retro Action Platformer with great story and Realistic world. Hand-to-Hand fight, using enviromental elements. Are You a real-life hero John?

name: TaskTwist
description: Bored with regular chores? In the VR simulation game TaskTwist, even cleaning can become a shocking adventure! Dive in and see if you can conquer the house without getting zapped!

name: Tile Ruler
description: Tile Ruler is a puzzle platformer with new kind of twist! You will have to select blocks/items and use them to beat different levels. But you can't take all these items with you, there is a limit. So are you ready to use your puzzle master skills and complete the adventorious story?

name: Icaria
description: Automate a team of robots to gather resources, scale up production, reshape terrain, and expand your colony on a procedurally generated alien world.

name: Dracula Awakens
description: Kill monsters using your camera and solve puzzles as you try to survive Dracula himself in his castle in this retro-style survival horror game.

name: Lighark
description: Lighark is a top-down action-adventure game where the protagonist pilots a spaceship, traversing through various wondrous planets and engaging in a revenge battle against the three factions of the galaxy. However, all of this is part of a larger conspiracy.

name: Tempest Inc.
description: Tempest Inc. is a 2D pixel art shoot-em-up focusing on characters and using their ship's unique abilities to fight through dynamic enemy engagements and boss battles!

name: Margoq's Lair
description: Margoq's Lair is a dark 2D top-down roguelike hack'n'slash dungeon crawler. Engage in action-packed combat, select between randomly generated spells, combine your abilities to make devastating attacks and find mythical items on your journey to escape the evil wizard's lair without dying even once!

name: Num-Sama
description: Num-Sama is third person melee combat game that can be played with Numpad keys.Promising to players a unique gaming experience.How you use your blade is important.

name: Squid Commando
description: Squid Commando is an action-packed, classic arcade run & gun game that can be played solo or in co-op.

name: Into the Depths of Despair
description: Into the Depths of Despair is a first-person psychological horror game. You navigate through endless mine shafts, searching for a way out while trying to stay alive. You are not alone!

name: Sliding
description: Sliding is a casual decryption game inspired by 2048 and Sliding Puzzle.

name: Urban Intel: Special Ops
description: Intense urban muliplayer FPS built in unreal engine delivering smooth animations & adrenaline filled multiplayer action. The special ops want to take control of urban territory & give it back to the government. The gangs have united to form a front against the threat. Which side will you be on?

name: DeadHex
description: DeadHex is an action packed fusion of MOBA and FPS, battling head-to-head to destroy your rival's headquarters. Command minions, crush towers, and wield artifacts in intense duels.

name: Into Arith
description: Embark on a journey to unravel the mysteries of your past within the enchanting, dark world of Arith. Explore the depths of your own memories in this evocative point-and-click adventure.

name: Forest Offroad Driving Simulator
description: Discover the beauties of nature with the Forest Offroad Driving Simulator! Customize your vehicle, conquer challenging roads, and get ready for adventure.

name: Low and Furious
description: Low and Furious is a thrilling driving game set in a Brazilian map that lets you customize your dream car and participate in exciting races and role-playing missions. With stunning graphics and engaging gameplay, BDQ is a must-play for racing game and car customization enthusiasts.

name: Flight 666
description: Solve the mystery before takeoff: Identify the impostor amid Halloween-costumed passengers in this turbulent flight for your life. Are you crazy or did you really see something that was 'not real'?

name: Flying Doggy
description:
Doggy doesn't like birds.
The birds always are teasing Doggy and run away.
Doggy want to pursue them but he can't fly.
One day, Doggy dreamed about flying in the sky.
Doggy can fly in his dream!
Now is the time to catch the birds!

name: Crazy Little Jumper
description:
You control a little dude. In his way there are many obstacles, but his only ability is to jump. This is where he needs your help. You make him jump by tapping the screen.
You can do two types of jumps: small jumps for small obstacles, and big jumps for big obstacles.
Through the levels you will need good timing and pure attention. There are 3 different worlds with total 63 action packed levels. Also, watch for holes, bounce pads, force fields and speed zones.
This game is fast, fun, addictive… and easy to play and easy to enjoy.

name: Rush City
description: Endless runner addictive fun from the developer of the #1 smash hit game Air Hockey! You are the sole survivor, hunted by evil humans...you must escape from Rush City! Jump from rooftop to rooftop, dodge helicopters, run as fast as you can! Buff up with piles of challenging objectives & use super powers to out score your friends!

name: Alone in the Dark: Collector's Edition
description:
The Collector's Edition includes:
- “The Dark Man” - Statue 26cm / 10 inch height
- “Ostadte” - Miniature 10cm / 4 inch height
- “Derceto 1930” - Wallstickers Set
- “Do not disturb” - Doorhang
- “Glow Alone in the Dark” Steelbook
- Collector’s Edition DLC Package including: Derceto 1992 Costume Pack, Director's Commentary Mode and Vintage Horror Filter Pack
- Standard Edition game

name: Coffee Talk 1+2 Double Pack Edition
description: Coffee Talk is a coffee brewing and heart-to-heart talking simulator about listening to fantasy-inspired modern peoples’ problems and helping them by serving up a warm drink or two. The Double Shot bundles both Coffee Talk 1 standard edition and Coffee Talk 2 collector’s editions together. Letting new players and existing fans get both games physically along with a large cup of goodies.

name: The Duel
description: A two-part head-to-head fighting game.

name: Naruto x Boruto: Ultimate Ninja Storm Connections - Collector's Edition
description:
NARUTO X BORUTO Ultimate Ninja STORM CONNECTIONS Collector's Edition
THE COLLECTOR'S EDITION INCLUDES:
A physical copy of the game - NARUTO X BORUTO Ultimate Ninja STORM CONNECTIONS
Naruto and Sasuke Exclusive Figurine Set (20th Anime Anniversary Ver.) 14 CM
Official Steelbook with original artwork
Special Collector's Game Case Inlay - featuring original artwork

name: Total War: Warhammer Trilogy
description:
Explore, expand and conquer a rich fantasy world with legions of mighty heroes or hordes of monstrous units under your command in the Total War: Warhammer Trilogy, bundled at a discount for the very first time.

Boasting all 3 base games, summon the elector counts as the Empire in Total War: Warhammer, burrow beneath your foes to establish secret undercities as the Skaven in Total War: Warhammer II, or spread deadly plagues to weaken your opponents as Nurgle in Total War: Warhammer III.

With this legendary bundle, carry all 16 races from the Trilogy into Total War: Warhammer III's Immortal Empires, and conquer one of the grandest strategy campaigns ever conceived, utilising each race’s unique sets of campaign mechanics, legendary lords, and battle possibilities.

name: SCP: Chamberz
description: SCP based mobile multiplayer horror game. Play as SCPs, MTF, Scientist or Dboi!

name: AK-xolotl: Collector's Edition
description:
The cutest, deadliest and UNIQUE Rogue-Lite shooting game, featuring AK-wielding Axolotls. Blast your way through the animal kingdom with an arsenal of impressive firearms, powerful power-ups, and even an army of trigger-happy baby axolotls.

The Collector's Edition includes:
- Game
- Collector's Box
- Soundtrack
- Postcard Set
- Key Ring
- Art Book
- Stickers Sheet
- Collectible Pin

name: Dead Cells: Return to Castlevania Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Operation Wolf Returns: First Mission - Rescue Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Unicorn Overlord: Collector's Edition
description:
Unicorn Overlord: Collector's Edition includes:
- Base Game
- Outer Box
- Artbook (132 pages)
- 16-bit Arranged Music Album
- Card game (239 cards, players: 2-4, play time: 30-120 minutes)
- DLC Voucher (ATLUS x Vanillaware Heraldry Pack)

name: Wizard with a Gun: Deluxe Edition
description: Wizard with a Gun is an online sandbox survival game for 1 - 2 players set in a magical wilderness wrought with dangerous creatures and arcane mysteries. Embark on a journey alone or with a friend to collect, craft, and outfit your wizard however you see fit as you explore the unknown.

name: The Legend of Steel Empire
description: In a dystopian world where the Motorhead Empire has conquered and enslaved virtually the entire planet, mammoth battleships, armored locomotives, and invincible fortresses dominate the skies. However, there is hope for the republic of Silverhead, and you are the only one who can save it. Take control of the Striker airplane or Zeppelin with an aerial mine launcher and engage in intense euro-shmup action, battling enemies both in the air and on the ground, and using devastating screen-clearing attacks in tight spots. With improved graphics and controls, Steel Empire, originally released in the early 90s for a 16-bit console, has been ported to various handheld consoles. Join the fight and defeat the Motorhead Empire.

name: Story of Seasons: A Wonderful Life - Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Teardown: Deluxe Edition
description:
Prepare the perfect heist in this simulated and fully destructible voxel world. Tear down walls with vehicles or explosives to create shortcuts. Stack objects to reach new heights. Use the environment to your advantage in the most creative way you can think of.

Teardown: Deluxe Edition includes
Teardown
Time Campers DLC - A campaign expansion set in the wild west. Available at launch.
Folkrace DLC - A campaign expansion that introduces new vehicles and a series of destructive racing game modes.

name: Evoland 1 & 2: 10th Anniversary Edition
description:
Contents of the 10th Anniversary Edition:

- Evoland 1 & 2: Immerse yourself in two games that marked the history of independent gaming by exploring the evolution of graphics and gameplay through different eras of video games.
- 4 Exclusive Pieces: Get collector’s items that celebrate EVOLAND’s decade.
- Stickers: Decorate your play space with themed stickers.
- Post card : Enjoy an exclusive postcard with original illustrations.
- Soundtrack (Dematerialized): Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of EVOLAND with the game’s soundtrack.
- Certificate of authenticity : Receive a certificate attesting to the authenticity of this limited edition.

name: Atari Gamestation Pro
description: The Gamestation Pro has over 200 games, including Atari 2600, Atari 5200, Atari 7800, Atari arcade and bonus games.

name: Maska
description: Sin descripción

name: Meta Lordz
description: Meta Lordz is a web3 free-to-play competitive game set in the mythical world of Glasmire, inspired by Norse and Viking tales. The game features MOBA-style combat focusing on precise skillshots, which is presented in a team-based game mode that combines thrilling Boss battles with objectives similar to capture-the-flag, creating a unique gaming experience.

name: City Driver
description: Welcome to City Driver. Your objective in this life-like driving game is simple: Get a job, earn money and gain experience to climb up the job ladder and get better jobs!

name: Shop Empire
description: Build the biggest, most luxurious and extemely profitable shopping malls around the world. Deploy and upgrade boots, restrooms, elevators and restaurants to make your vistors spending lots and lots of money. Hire cleaners to keep it tidy, technicians for dealing with power failures and security against the shop lifters.

name: Zoo Transport
description: Help this little penguin take all the animals in the zoo to their cages. Drive carefully and don't ruin the boxes!

name: Got Cha Mini Game Festival 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Aura's Room
description: A bitsy game about a girl in her room.

name: Di Gi Charat RPG
description: Di Gi Charat RPG is a Korean exclusive mobile game based on the anime Di Gi Charat.

name: Moonfall
description:
Midway through the 21st century, man has finally mastered the technology required for travel to, and colonisation of, distant planets. The first starship, Deadalus I, set off in the year 2052 heading for Wolf 359, a small red star some 8.1 years away from Earth.

As the scientists arrived some generations later they discovered that the dual star solar system was entirely devoid of planets. There was no more in that solar system than a large number of asteroid belts. On closer inspection it appeared that among the asteroids there flew thousands of tiny craft, automatically controlled mining vessels. It seems that previous colonists has destroyed all the planets so they could mine more efficiently.

Deadalus I headed for the only lump of rock bigger than an asteroid but smaller than a planet, a moon that no longer had a planet to orbit. This moon, christened Frontier Alfa, was inhabited by a race of independent capitalist and unscrupulous robots and their creators the Remusians. The Remusians were small bug-eyed humanoids who took a much less active role in the colony than the Roboforms.

The Earth starship was soon captured by the Remusians, who enslaved the human habitants. Some of them escaped capture however, and established a small colony of their own. They set you up as a trader, with the ultimate aim of making enough profit to be able to buy the whole colony and become supreme leader, thereby being able to free the enslaved humans.

name: Escape from the Shadows
description: Escape from the Shadows is the seventh installment in the Hidden Town series of escape games. Embark on a thrilling point-and-click adventure and solve puzzles and riddles trying to escape from the shadow world.

name: PieceFall VR
description: Sin descripción

name: Ninja Chop!!
description: Xbox Live QTE indie game.

name: Noyd
description: Xbox Live indie game by Bog Turtle Games LLC.

name: Homecoming: My Monster-Hunter Girlfriend
description: A short linear visual novel about love, mental-health and werewolves. Developed for Spooktober VN Jam 2023.

name: Cute Fame: Halloween Bash
description:
3 Endings. 3 Outcomes. 3 People.

(This. The game that is being played. It is a night of deaths. Deaths that may end with you dying. Be careful, As one wrong choice can lead to your death! But, Time to explain this game, I will call it a party, Since that was the location it had happened. An Halloween party)

This game is a visual novel! Most events in this story were meant to be fiction. Although no research has concluded certain events like this never happened to anyone ever. It is also similarly based off the current "Cute Fame" universe, With changes that make some things feel fresh.

name: Play-Doh Creations
description:
Your creativity takes shape on Play-Doh Island!

It's creativity and show-and-tell at its best! Hop aboard the Play-Doh Island express and travel to four different creation locations. Invent all kinds of creatures at the Laboratory. Design their costumes and hair styles at the Mini Mall. Craft crazy vehicles at the Factory. Mix up some delicious Play-Doh treats at the Bakery. Then...it's showtime at the theater! Play-Doh Pete hosts "The Great Doh Show" musical review starring YOUR animated creations!

name: Lead Soldier
description: Real-time strategy in a setting of World War II, a mix between Cannon Fodder and Commandos. Game contains several missions in which a player commands a group of soldiers with different specialities.

name: Fire Emblem: Andaron Saga
description: Andaron Saga is a fully-fledged 31-chapter romhack for Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones created by Mangs and a team of talented developers and artists, featuring select gameplay elements from multiple different eras of Fire Emblem history with a focus on high replayability and numerous secrets. Jump into a story crafted by a professional writer/novel seller.

name: My Little Guessy
description: Guess the episode from a random My Little Pony screencap, featuring frames from Friendship is Magic, Make Your Mark and Tell Your Tail.

name: Skybreakers
description: Choose from a variety of classes, arm yourself with a vast array of weapons, and create your own unique build by combining treasures, random talents, cultivation methods, and bonds. Use unique abilities to defeat a variety of monsters, demons, and devils.

name: 13 Rosas
description:
A first-person horror adventure game for Android.

A virtual memorial for the lack of physical ones.

A reminder of the disgusting spirit of the assassins. See how ravenous they become when they fear our freedom.

Dedicated to the forgotten ones on the side of my country's roads. And to the thirteen women. Executed to give example, they became an unspoken symbol for everything that is worth fighting for.

¡Viva la República!

name: Alien Poker
description: Alien Poker is a five-card draw poker game featuring five different computer-controlled opponents in which the player can select 1 to 3 to play with them.

name: Ultimate Gin
description: Ultimate Gin is a gin card game featuring a number of computer personalities to play with (up to 8 in the registered version!)

name: Fisherman’s Bait: Marlin Challenge
description: Sin descripción

name: SuperSki Pro
description:
SuperSki Pro is a game of winter Olympic sports, successor of SuperSki II.

Players can choose one the few game modes (Training, Competition, Championship mode 1 or mode 2), level of difficulty and one of six winter sports events: Downhill, Giant Slalom, Slalom, Snowboard, Snowboard Slalom, Ski Jump (in the CD-ROM versions, there is a seventh discipline: Bobsleigh). Players may use different skiing gear, one of 4 routes, play against a computer player.

All events show the player from behind, except Ski Jump where the camera follows the jumper. In competitions mode, players will have to climb from the amateur league to the top professional league before having a chance fighting for the cup.

name: Digimon 20th Anniversary Digivice
description: An updated rerelease of the original Digimon virtual pet from 1997. New features include caring for two Digimon at the same time, multiple new obtainable Digimon, and a single-player Arena battle mode.

name: Vital Bracelet Arena
description: A companion app for the Vital Bracelet, Vital Bracelet BE and Vital Hero virtual pet. Players can fight in online battles, send characters on adventures to locate items, archive thwir characters and raise their stats.

name: Water
description: Water is a third person puzzle solving adventure type of game with an unique look and gameplay. It's a story about a mermaid, and fish men who aren't fish men. A story that brings you into tears and fears. It's about fish people, harp instruments, swimming, and crazy priests.

name: Pokémon Re:Union
description:
Red, now a legend with many trainers and recognized worldwide, returns to his native region after his journey to become a Pokémon Master.
A journey that ends with a merciless battle on the summit of Mont Argenté against a certain trainer...
But his return was not to be as he had hoped.
A strange phenomenon seems to be appearing in the Kanto region.
Numerous ultra-breaks have begun to appear all over the region.
It is said that a certain policeman by the name of Beladonis is seeking to speak to this legendary trainer as soon as possible, to ask for his help in this matter.
What new adventures await Red alongside Beladonids?

name: Kaze no Tansakusha: Grand Slam
description: A Japanese rogue-like RPG developed by Gruppo One. The game's aesthetics are influenced by tabletop gaming, with the characters designed to look like figurines moving through dioramas.

name: ODR Hockey Heroes
description: ODR Hockey Heroes is a brand new arcade hockey video game featuring ultra-smooth pick-up-and-play controls that'll have you scoring goals and laying hitz like a true legend.

name: Omega Blast
description: Omega Blast is a homebrew caravan-style shooter developed by Nendo to commemorate the Sega Genesis 30th anniversary.

name: Kaze no Tansakusha 2: Shadow Kingdom
description: The direct sequel to Kaze no Tansakusha: Grand Slam. It retains the series' tabletop-inspired aesthetics, with characters depicted as figurines on a game board.

name: Ding! MONO
description: A hexagon-based strategy game created by Gruppo One. It has an aesthetic inspired by tabletop wargames, which characters that look like figurines.

name: Hop Island
description: An upcoming puzzle game by minidavid.

name: Voice Paradise
description:
The hero of the game is in his space ship, on the way to his home planet. But the space ship crash-lands on the Earth. The hero is on an important intergalactic mission and has to be on his home planet no later than in one month. He tries to figure out what caused the crash, and discovers that it was a voice that interfered with the ship's radio waves. Suddenly, three anime girls appear in front of him. They are Citron, Jasmine, and Cinnamon, the heroines of a TV anime series called "Elfin Triangle". They explain that the voice that caused the disturbance was that of a famous Japanese voice actress.... they just don't know which one. To get a sample of this voice would be the only hope to repair the ship... so the hero and his three lovely companions have to find out who the voice belongs to!

Voice Paradise plays, for the most part, like an adventure game with an internal schedule. A visit to every locations costs one game day, and the hero has only 30 days to find the voice actress. The locations include TV studio, CD shop, and other locations that have anything to do with anime and voice acting. The game contains plenty of material about Japanese voice actresses, so it can be described as educational. In order to successfully locate the actress, it is necessary to gather as much information as possible and take part in quiz that would narrow down the search and bring the hero nearer to the goal.

name: Grid16
description: Play 16 games in a giant grid all at once! After one ends the other begins, and as you play longer the game will speed up faster and faster. Definitely has some roots in the 4 second series. This game does a better job simplifying goals and objectives, and will give you a breakdown of your skills at the end! Use your gaming instincts... instructions are extremely limited!

name: Platform Racing
description:
Platform Racing (commonly abbreviated PR1) is a 2007 online multiplayer racing Flash game that was developed by Jacob Grahn.

Its premise was inspired by Mario Kart, with him setting out to create a sidescrolling platformer spin on its formula.

name: Brush Burial
description:
Brush Burial is a lo-fidelity First Person Snatcher.

You play as Fennel, a knife-wielding swamp devil with an eye for gold and a penchant for violence. Use your tail to toy with your prey: grab and fling objects, climb impossible heights, and knock your enemies off balance.

name: Astrobatics
description: Astrobatics is a fast-paced game that will delight fans of the space-shooter genre, and indeed adrenalin-seekers in general, and the sheer speed of the action is something that's impossible to get across in words.

name: Arcadrome
description: Dark time for the Human race has come. The Earth is in danger. Aliens are going to capture planet Earth (as they always are). It's clear to see that they are ugly, loathsome, vile and have the worst designs of all conquerers. Women will be eaten away, the brains of intelligent men will be worked into liquid assigned to wash their nasty spaceships, children will be taken away for terrible experiments.

name: Girl Wars: Fantasy World Unification Battle
description: Anime mobile game set in a fantasy world, The Savior fights with pretty girls to defeat the Devil in the fantasy world!

name: We'reWolves
description: Dive into a thrilling dungeon-crawling adventure inspired by games like Vampire Survivors and Halls of Torment! Customize your character, choose your class, battle through diverse landscapes, and face an ever-growing horde of enemies as you build yourself up in this chaotic werewolf-themed game.

name: Undying Memoir
description:
Undying Memoir is a platforming game with unlockable lore.
This is a fangame based on Touhou Project.

name: Destiny Maiden
description:
Destiny Maiden is a mobile card battle game with authentic TCG/CCG sensibility.
An online turn strategy card battle game, The coin system of unit cards that will be a variable in battle, Psychological warfare of invisible magic cards, With 6 hand cards and shuffling opportunities provided every turn Unleash a variety of powerful card combinations that can change the battlefield.

name: Perfect Bird Pitch
description:
Save chicks with a cute black cat! Guess and identify its parent birds with its voice. All you need is so-called perfect pitch!

The appearance of the chicks is all white and unrecognizable, but they are to chirp in the same pitch as their parent birds.

The black cat felt benevolent toward the chicks that dropped down due to the strong wind and decided to look for its parent birds.

By the time you have done the entire game, you will have developed a nearly absolute pitch sense.

name: FM4X
description: FM4X is a four-part mod by Fernando Márquez that was created for Duke Nukem 3D: Atomic Edition. Released over the course of 16 years from 2004-2020, each of the four installments replaces one of the episodes from the base game.

name: Shaky Ground: Apocollapse
description:
Duke woke up from his slumber. The hotel room looked dark.
The sky outside still tried to go for as many shades of grey as possible, but at least it stopped raining.
What just happened? It felt like the entire room was shaking.. An earthquake?
As far as Duke knew, there were no major fault lines in Europe. Must have been his imagination.
Suddenly, the room started to violently shake again. But this time, it didn't stop...

name: Shaky Grounds: Tragedy
description:
Having survived the events of part 1: Apocollapse, Duke tries to find his way towards the epicentre of the disaster, located right underneath a local venue called "The Kompleks". The situation is dire. The alien weapon is recharching for an even bigger blast and time is running out. Duke is the only one close enough to get there before it's too late. But deep chasms, collapsed buildings and unstable surfaces transformed the city into a very dangerous and hostile environment.
And that's without mentioning the constant assault of ruthless aliens, sent by their mysterious leader Froyd Eenakee..

name: Shaky Grounds: Epicenter
description:
This continues right where the last part left off. You finally know why Froyd Eenakee is after you and the human race, and you know there's a very big ticking clock looming above your head.
Luckily, in his arrogance he was stupid enough to let you go. You made your way out of the alien hive back on the streets, so there's no time to loose.
Try to reach 'The Kompleks', descent into the epicenter of the quake and find the doomsday device before it strikes again!

name: Lorch 3
description: A previously unfinished large city map, it has now been rereleased with fixes.

name: Duke It's Zero Hour
description: Duke It's Zero Hour is a total conversion for Duke Nukem 3D. The project was developed by ZeroHour Software and released on November 1, 1997. It features new levels, weapons, enemies, music, sound effects, and even an original boss. Duke It's Zero Hour is sometimes purported to have been an officially authorized expansion that was originally slated for retail sale via WizardWorks, but these claims are disputed.

name: Gestalt_OS
description: Gestalt_OS is a cryptic logic processing program designed for aliens. You must decipher the interactions between symbols to create special patterns to progress.

name: Friday the 13th RPG: A Fan Game
description: A fan project starring 13 playable characters in scenarios from the NES game and the first seven films.

name: WG Mega
description: Over 40 levels by William Gee. 4 FULL singleplayer Episodes and 1 dukematch.

name: Blast Radius
description: Blast Radius is a fan add-on for the Apogee/3D Realms classic 1996 FPS Duke Nukem 3D by ck3d. Features a brand new episode of 15 maps as well as 40+ new types of alien scum.

name: Genetic
description: Genetic, Jaco's original title for the mod that was meant to include Last Reaction, Water Bases, and Chimera.

name: Roch Series
description: A compilation of all 8 maps and 1 secret map of the Roch series.

name: Red Series
description: A compilation of all 5 maps of the Red series.

name: It Lives
description: It Lives is a singleplayer map made for Duke Nukem 3d, more specifically for its Eduke32 port. Be sure to set your video setups in software mode before playing.

name: Metropolitan Mayhem
description: Metropolitan Mayhem is a 15-map mod for Duke Nukem 3D (Atomic Edition). It's themetically very close to the original first and third episodes (LA Meltdown & Shrapnel City) of Duke Nukem 3D, concentrating almost exclusively on classic urban-themed maps.

name: Sir Fred
description: Sir Fred is a platform game where the protagonist must infiltrate the great castle of Beni-Gómez to rescue his beloved princess. The player guides Sir Fred through different rooms of the castle to complete his mission. The protagonist must avoid the numerous dangers and use different objects that will help him reach his destination.

name: Impostor but Huggy Wuggy
description: Help Noob, Pro, Chitter and others escape from the ship and try to survive Huggy Wuggy.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's Area 51
description:
After the closing of Freddy Fazbears Pizza, Polices has realized the animatronics moved on their own.... they have been taken to a facility for a check.
You have gotten a job to keep an eye on them through the night. You must use the high tech systems to protect yourself against the animatronics!

name: Nightmare Below Disney
description: “With darkness, even your nightmares can come true."

name: Shin Megami Tensei if...
description:
Like the first two entries in the Shin Megami Tensei series, the spin-off with the mysterious title If... got its own remake. As in the other two cases, the graphics of the remade version have been redone from scratch, to match the 2D standard of 32-bit generation consoles. Interior locations are much more detailed, with visible furniture and other items in rooms that were empty or contains just a few objects in the original version.

The 3D dungeons can now be navigated with smooth scrolling, unlike the "jumping" navigation of the earlier versions. The remake also has an additional difficulty level, dubbed "normal"; the original difficulty level is called "hard". The easier difficulty level also reduces the amount of random battles. Story, dialogues, layout of locations, and general gameplay remain unchanged in this version.

name: Pilsner Urquell: Undress Me!!!
description: Catch beer bottles in a beer crate to undress the selection of 3 girls on-screen.

name: Fire Emblem: Deity Device
description:
Deity Device is a heavily story driven romhack of Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones created by the user Permafrost. The game begins with a young noblewoman on a pilgrimage with her band of knights, but she is diverted when her brother is kidnapped, gradually being drawn into the larger plot. Both the gameplay and story are strongly inspired by Genealogy of the Holy War; with a focus on large maps and political schemes.

The game features:
-39 Main Story Chapters and 10 Gaiden Chapters
-A smaller more developed cast of 26 playable units
-An all new magic system

name: Rushing Punch
description: Xbox Live indie game by Divider Games

name: Ganbare Natsuki-san
description: Ganbare Natsuki San is a puzzle platform game that bears a remarkable similarity to the cult classic Umihara Kawase. The player controls the swimsuit-clad girl Natsuki, who is armed with only an extending claw with which to grapple onto objects.

name: Hydrofusion Substation
description: A hydrofusion sub station! at the duke´s birthday!

name: Men in Black
description: An old map that was initially made to look like the Bronx from New York but later retooled into Men in Black

name: Danganronpa: Live or Die
description: Follow Megumi and 15 other people locked inside a luxurious mansion. An evil mechanical bear known as Monokuma forces them to play a killing game. Will they start killing each other? Who will survive?

name: Rush Back
description: The teletransporter that Duke Used in MibTELE to come back to earth, lost it's frequency and the antimatter resonance got absorbed by an electrical storm of biblical proportions, apparently caused by a strange mineral that has been found inside of a coke mine, this mineral that is no less than the one allowing the teletransportation, in big quantities, it generates a magnetic field able to change the polarity of an electrical current from a radio of 3 to 5 miles, and given it's qualities it's being exploited by the hydroelectric company from the zone where the mineral has been found. Duke's problem lies on the fact that communications are being interrupted by the leaking of said mineral from a capsule that was accidentally destroyed, and the matter, when being vaporized, it generated this huge storm that puts the entire zone in jeopardy by the mere fact that the dam where the company used to substract it's energy, is being collapsed and about to crumble, with the fore coming catastrophe, Duke must enter the mine to find the mineral core and destroy it to prevent the invasion of the aliens.

name: Lorch 2
description: Duke is still trying to find kidnapped Alejandro. At HQ he discovered that Alejandro should be in another part of the town.

name: Lorch: Abducted
description: Duke received a letter from his friend. The letter said that one very famous person was abducted. Duke has to go to a small town to save it.

name: Spacetronic
description: A space level made on my birthday. To escape, you need to solve 3 issues to fix the machine.

name: The Unknown Planet
description: A mysterious and strange map on a weird alien planet.

name: Another Attack: Woudrichem War
description: Woudrichem War is a huge city map, based on a real-life location in the Netherlands. It's an entire city on an island,.

name: Another Attack 2: Weissensee
description: A sequel to Another Attack, continuing straight from where Woudrichem left off. While the previous map was based on a real-life town in the Netherlands, Weissensee is based on a lake and its surroundings in Austria.

name: Desert Storm
description: A large level set in a canyon somewhere in the US. Duke has to infiltrate a command center, which is now under alien control, and kill the two overlords responsible for the takeover - the Bruiser Brothers.

name: The 3D Gamemaker
description:
Unleash your imagination...

Now anyone can build their ideal game in seconds. With just one click of a mouse, you can create a uniquely playable game without needing any programming knowledge or artistic skills at all. Offering over 12 billion gaming options. The 3D Gamemaker opens up a whole concept in gaming, providing fun for all the family.

name: Bloomers 2000
description:
Divine bloomers were found on the Moon. An evil group BB group "Big Bloomer Group" seeks a way to make the whole world into a bloomer, and the international MIB "Men in Bloomer" organization monitors the subtle bloomer balance in the world. Their conflict becomes inevitable.
Tokiwa Ai is an ordinary girl who becomes chosen as a goddess of bloomers, and from now on she's a bloomers justice warrior!

name: Sekai de Ichiban Kimi ga Suki!
description: You are a show-business reporter who helps idols. One day you're tasked to make photos of rival idol night date. Horny pictures were made without problem, but you start to question such immoral approach and get closer to truth...

name: Clear The Coast
description:
A rather large, mostly outdoor map, designed for classic duke and taking full
advantage of the new build limits.
So expect some big outdoor locations and the freedom to roam and stroll around a lot.

name: Mincer City
description: Mincer City, once a city known for it´s idyllicchances to live turns into enormous death trap for Duke. Duke´s mission is to infiltrate FIX&MIX building to get forward on his way, but it isn´t as simple as it sounds; you also have to clear the city for alien vermin before they will get more help.

name: Another Big Base Attacked
description: The sequel to Alien Planet X64-2.

name: Roch Island
description: One of the biggest and most detailed city maps ever as a tribute to Pascal Rouaud's amazing Roch series

name: ADG Episode
description: Duke was working for the EDF and received a call because the aliens are planning to build a HUGE weapon on earth and use it to destroy another planets and then, the same Earth. So there is no time to sleep, Duke runs out to find them and stop these fucking aliens!

name: The Lost Moonbase
description: In an EDF's secret base Duke didn't stop the aliens and they have stolen a very powerful bomb in that hi-tech airplane. Destination was unknown...

name: EDF Secret Base
description: After clearing the YMF500G space station, Duke returned to Earth and went to the EDF Headquarters to ask what the hell happened in the space station.

name: Blackened
description: Sin descripción

name: Another Timeless Night
description: Duke was taking the subway home when the aliens decide to attack the station while he was waiting for his connecting train.

name: Military Madness
description: M&Y Corporation is an enterprise that illegaly sells weapons and military equipment to another countries. They earn a very high amount of money with this business and they don't think that a possible war is coming...

name: The Big City
description: A very big city map

name: Alien Planet X64-2
description: A duke level with a radical departure from the more usual themes, X64-2 is a very well textured, extremely well layed out map based on some alien world.

name: The Toxicity
description: Aliens have taken over a city and have set up residence, and of course as Duke it's your job to flush the bastards out

name: Operation: Get Bike Back
description: A new city map packed full of explosion-prone buildings, monstrous enemies and excellent gameplay.

name: Dukem Memorial Hospital
description: Dukem Memorial Hospital is invaded by aliens.

name: Moonland
description: Duke makes an impromtu landing into the alien moonbase.

name: Half-Life 2: MMod - Minerva
description: This is a mod to run the existing Half-Life 2 mod, Minerva (2013), via Half-Life 2: MMod.

name: A Super Mario Bros. X Thing: Prelude To The Stupid!
description: A Super Mario Bros. X Thing: Prelude to the Stupid was the first major game developed by the Talkhaus through the Super Mario Bros. X engine, and is the second game in the A Super Mario Thing series. It follows Demo and Iris collecting leeks through "The Castle of No Significance". In addition to Demo and Iris, three other characters are playable; Kood (from Drama Mistery), Raocow, and Sheath (from ATXS).

name: Demolition Plant
description: Duke has been sent to stop aliens from ruining the Hydro Fusion Sub Station apart somewhere in Nevada. After this Duke finds himself in Demolition Plant, before known as Modern World Building Site. It seems to like those aliens can´t stop going on with their plans so Duke has to kick some tough alien arse, and find out what kind of evil plans are waiting for him...

name: Resistance Rocks
description: Duke has been sent to stop aliens from ruining the Hydro Fusion Sub Station apart somewhere in Nevada.

name: One Day After School
description: Short doujin visual novel created as a test for further projects.

name: Bedrone
description: Duke's dream time is interrupted when his ride crash-lands behind enemy lines. Duke must find a way to the Gateway, or die trying. Mind the native population.

name: Deadfall
description:
Duke mistakenly shoots down his ride home, and has to make
another arrangement for passage. The local doghearts want him to stay, for dinner! After figuring out the menu, Duke decides to have a barbecue of his own!

name: Lighthouse
description: How many Pigcops does it take to stop Duke from screwing in a light bulb? You probably know the answer. It is dawn. Duke is sent to repair a lighthouse overrun by aliens. A hard climb to the base of the tower, and Duke finds there are eight floors to the top , and the elevator is locked. Some pigcops have learned to toss morters, some turrets have been upgraded to RPG launchers, and Duke is thinking he will be putting in some overtime on this job.

name: Oranges
description: Duke must regain control of the intergalactic orange juice plant for our chicks.

name: Valves
description: Duke drops in to thwart the pigcops plans to blow up our toxic waste facility.

name: Clearwater
description: Duke decides to invade a quiet little Nuclear Waste Facility. When the tresspasser is discovered, the alien troops are alerted, and what follows is mayhem.

name: Voices of Authority
description: A mission-based level from SalaciusCrumb, You will have to slum it through a deactivated defence ship.

name: Redrock
description: A map with a lot of red rocks and your mission is nothing else but blast the way to the nukebutton.

name: Alphacity
description: A big city map

name: Wéko The Mask Gatherer
description: Discover a vast world of mystery, filled with fearsome enemies, extraordinary tales and unforgettable scenery. Find and collect powerful masks to help an unlikely hero fight back the darkness.

name: Klonoa: Door to Phantomile
description: Klonoa: Door to Phantomile is a remaster of the original 2.5D platformer game, released for modern consoles with enhanced graphics. The game was bundled with Klonoa 2: Lunatea’s Veil in the Phantasy Reverie series. This version is actually a remaster of the 2008 Wii remake, simply titled Klonoa, with the character designs and colors remaining more faithful to the original PS1 game.

name: Pikmin 2: Caveless Edition
description: Pikmin 2: Caveless Edition is a brand-new mod of Pikmin 2, which redesigns the story mode of Pikmin 2 to remove all of the caves and keep the design and style similar to Pikmin 1 and 3. There are numerous changes to the gameplay and level design to suit this new playstyle, including White Pikmin having their own onions (credit to PikHacker for the Purple and White Onions mod), different enemies and bosses on the overworld and a completely redesigned progression. It’s up to you and your squad of Pikmin to collect all 51 treasures scattered across the four overworlds.

name: Cream Lemon: Star Trap
description: This visual novel faithfully follows the story of Star Trap, the 10th episode of the adult OVA (Original Video Animation) series Cream Lemon while featuring some additional scenes.

name: Story Craft
description:
Story Craft is a story-writing simulation game using ChatGPT.
Register your friends as characters and create your own story!

name: Slender Multiplayer
description:
You and up to seven others enter the Slenderman forest.
As a survivor, you must collect all 8 pages to escape and free your curse.
As Slenderman, you must eliminate all survivors.
Play Singleplayer or Multiplayer with 8 player lobbies!
You have the option to play vs a CPU Slenderman or vs another player.

name: Deltarune: Rouxls Kaard
description: Witness the Duke of Puzzles, the Crafty Box-Maker, the... Lesser Dad? Fight in a battle of wit and unfair advantages readily given to your opponent, thee Rouxls Kaard. Puzzling jukes, jabs, and jars are sure to trip you up so keep your head (and your HP) high whilst combat commenceth.

name: Boil Noodles at Night
description: Late night noodle aquisition and cooking simulator.

name: Pathology
description: The goal of Pathology is simple. Get to the exit in the least number of moves. Pathology is a grid-based block pushing puzzle game focused on optimization.

name: Dale and Peakot
description: Play Dale And Peakot, a great action platform / puzzle game. Take two roles as Dale the farmer with a shotgun as well as Peakot his sidekick chicken with an attitude. Use Dale to take out bad guys, but the twist is you control Peakot at the same time to fly around and hit levers and switches. Try to solve your way out of eggy situations, and get back the stolen hens that have been captured by the coyotes.

name: Take the King!
description: Take the King! is a puzzle game based on the rules of chess, reimagined to offer original intellectual challenges. While your pieces move normally, the chessboard is anything but standard, and you have a variety of goals.

name: Arcade Sundown
description: Challenge the pinball people! Get shrunk down and play a mad points-scoring game inside pinball machines. Feint, travel, and tackle your way to high score glory — all’s fair under the glass.

name: Tyrannizer
description:
Tyrannizer is a first-person shooter game with a mix of sci-fi and fantasy elements, likely inspired by Quake. The player character uses a sword for a close-rangge weapon alongside modern era firearms, but the game is set in a medieval looking castle populated with mythical creatures.

The game was developed with the ACKNEX 3D GameStudio construction set, which is more similar to the Build 2.5D engine than to the true 3D Quake engine, and uses sprites for enemies, items and decorations. Build-engine like advanced features are used like bridges or balconies that can be walked on and passed under, and the ability to swim underwater.

name: Neil The Nail
description: Neil the Nail is a point and click puzzle game where you play as 2 unique characters trying to escape their fate - Neil the Nail, and Mr. Magnet.

name: Fortune Decker
description: Fortune Decker is a top-down roguelike, deckbuilding, action survival game in which you'll need to use your cards to fight the incoming hordes of enemies and survive while building your own deck.

name: Creepy
description: Creepy is an Maze game, developed and published by Thalamus, which was released in Europe in 1990. Decent Snake clone with nice graphics and sound, but gameplay is frustrating where your time in the game is your score.

name: Club Backgammon
description:
The backgammon game you've been waiting for is here. California Dreams brings you Club Backgammon, a sensational new backgammon game that lets you play against the computer or another player.
Club Backgammon provides a computer opponent that can play at three different levels: beginner, intermediate and advanced. Improve your strategy with the computer opponent and then challenge your friends.
Club Backgammon has many exciting features. An automatic scorekeeper will keep score for you. The doubling cube lets you play for high stakes. The game log lets you see all the moves that have been made during the game.
So become a member of the fastest growing club around and experience Club Backgammon for yourself!

name: Ojou-sama Express
description: The protagonist boards the special express train "Vega" that departs from Wakkanai in Hokkaido and travels through various cities such as Tokyo and Osaka over a period of 15 days, crossing Japan. During this journey, the objective of the game is to get to know and become friends with the girls who board the train at various stations, leaving behind enjoyable memories. The basic actions involve moving around the Vega's train cars and tourist spots to find the girls and engage in multiple conversations to advance the scenario.

name: Cosmos Club
description: Main character is a freshman student who gets to enter a student dormitory "Cosmos club" full of girls. He is secretly in love with one of the girls and seeks her attention.

name: Tsykial
description: Tsykial is a teaser game containing various logs, data files and images related to Five Nights at Treasure Island.

name: Damage: The Sadistic Butchering of Humanity
description: Sin descripción

name: Duke!Zone II
description: Duke!Zone II is an expanded 1997 re-release of Duke!ZONE and an authorized expansion pack for Duke Nukem 3D. Duke!ZONE II introduces three original episodes by Simply Silly Software. Although removed from the Kill-A-Ton Collection version, the original Duke!ZONE II also included the 500 user maps from the first Duke!ZONE.

name: Nightmare Before Disney: Halloween Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Pixel Art Academy: Learn Mode
