description: Pixel Art Academy is an educational game for learning how to draw. Learn Mode is a standalone version that focuses on the interactive tutorials, drawing challenges, and projects where you make your own art for video games.

name: Almond Ridge
description: A short visual novel roleplaying game set in a nursing home where the residents have been going missing.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Hyper Dimension
description: The European port of Dragon Ball Z: Hyper Dimension lacks the story mode, present in the Japanese version.

name: Innocent Tour
description: Innocent Tour is a combination of Strategy/RPG where you choose one of three characters, and the computer controls the two you don't choose. You battle against enemies both CPU controlled and monsters wandering the board.

name: Readyyy!
description: Sin descripción

name: Sea Fever
description:
Sea Fever is a horror visual novel with blood, gore, abusive relationships, and monsters. Dive in, but beware!

Marella and Dylan are girlfriends who live a quiet and self-sufficient life in paradise. But Dylan's dreams and ambitions are greater than a little house by the sea, and she is drawn to the city to pursue her acting career.

Now, bound together only by letters, Marella must face not only the pressures of keeping up a long distance relationship, but a strange and growing sickness, and dark monsters from the only place she's ever considered home.

Can Dylan and Marella's relationship survive? And what, exactly, is the monster plaguing her nightmares?

name: Shared Beauty
description: Shared Beauty is a dark fairy tale about jealousy, friendships lost, and aging, set in a fictional medieval German village.

name: Snot Put
description: Snot Put - A Nitrome Game. Pick, lick and flick your way to success getting the maximum distance!

name: Dinosaur King: Fierce Battle! Zanjark!
description:
The fourth entry of the arcade machine series, where you fight with dinosaurs with a rock, paper, scissors enhanced system.

This version brings a totally new story, where apparently Alpha gang stop being a menace to the dinosaurs, but now, the D-Team has to face a new enemy, Zanjark, space pirates who want universal dominance.
This entry has the habitual new dinosaurs and moves introduction, but also, added the first power up/gimmick to the series, Armored dinosaur, Dinotector for the heroes, and Jark armors for the enemies.

name: Gunfire Reborn: Artisan and Magician
description: Two new heroes will join your adventure. You can choose to either strategically command the power of the star card or summon a mecha to fight alongside you. At the same time, they also bring four new weapons, including a submachine gun, a compass, an squid, and... a brick that conceals subtle golden sheen.

name: Classic Invaders
description:
Classic Invaders is a variant of Space Invaders: accelerated and in colour.

The game elements and goals are the same as in the original: a lone laser cannon must fend off hordes of alien invaders, who move rhythmically towards the bottom of the screen. As the game progresses, the invading hordes become faster and more aggressive.

The best scores are stored in the "Killer Kings" high score table.

name: Block Buster
description:
Block Buster is a 1-player arcade game for the VIC-20.

While exploring an alien planet in your multi-terrain vehicle, you have fallen into a labyrinth of ice rocks. As these rocks melt, ice monsters hatch from them and track you down. Your only defense is to push a block of ice rock, sending it crashing into the monsters. The monsters can also push and break through ice rocks, and ice rocks can be destroyed by hitting them against another rock or against the side of the labyrinth.

The vehicle has limited fuel, and a buzzer will ring when the machine is low. The truck can be refueled by crushing a diamond ore rock. The player has a total of 3 lives, and there are always 2 enemies per stage. There are 8 levels of difficulty.

name: Dr.Roland
description:
The patient is suffering a terrible virus infection, and your role as Dr.Roland is to get rid of those ugly and funky viruses, throwing them colored vitamin capsules.

If four elements of the same color get together, all of them will disappear, and you will be one step closer to cure the infection.

Dr.Roland is a tetrislike game that you can enjoy alone with your Amstrad CPC, or in a fun battle with a friend side to side.

name: Paradise Sickness
description: Large Egyptian level with an archeological research base built into a tomb below a pyramid. The map features several popcultural references and the map source is included.

name: For My Babies
description: Medium sized dark Wizard/Metal map

name: Gunrox
description: Gunrox is a free to play multiplayer browser based online strategy game, where you control a squad of soldiers and battle with other players from around the world in turn-based combat. In Gunrox, the main objective is to outwit your opponent with your own squad of three units against other players from around the world. Duke it out in vibrant locales, ranging from junkyards to city streets, each with its own unique colorful landscapes. With so much to offer, Gunrox is a unique experience that may get you addicted in the good kind of way!

name: Freestyle Football Z
description: 4v4 Football Game

name: Word Space
description: Guess the word before you lose all the petals from the sunflower. Go through 50+ levels and complete them all to learn new words and phrases.

name: Two Lane
description:
Two Lane is a fast-paced one-button game.

You control a car driving on a two lane highway. Press a button to change lanes and hold a button to go faster. The road is interrupted by the grass patches. You will slow down when you touch a grass patch.

The game is over when you slow down completely.

name: Space Time Ocean
description: Time and space foam island, unknown biological resources, construction base, adventure trip.

name: Minimalist Tower Defense
description: A tower defense game with simple and interesting graphics and game mechanics. Defensive towers with various features to resist tens of thousands of enemies in each game

name: Shisya
description: Horror adventure game to appraise spirits photos

name: Taboo Trial: Skadi
description:
This DLC contains the following content:
1. New character Skadi
2. Unlock Skadi skin and defeat Image

name: Taboo Trial: Skuld
description:
This DLC contains the following content:
1. New character skuld
2. Unlock skuld skin and defeat Image

name: Kijin-mura no Kiken na Inshuu: Dangerous Village Tradition
description: The strange custom of "Onibarai" held in the village they moved to. The countryside life of the newlywed couple is infiltrated by the villagers' sinister intentions...!?

name: Ice Survival
description: A very casual and cute strategy game that uses your intelligence to crack all levels. This is only the first season, first edition

name: Ancient Wind Spread
description: The first work of an independent small team, many deficiencies, please do not hesitate to correct! We will fix and update your problems as soon as possible. The scholar's career is not good and he retires to the countryside. Intertwined with the fate of five different styles of women.

name: Spiral of War
description: "Spiral of War" is a dynamic bullet-hell shooter infused with modern warfare. Inspired by "Vampire", "Battle Royale", and "LoL", it offers a fresh experience. After battles, equipment syncs to the cloud. Players face diverse foes, diving into epic brawls.

name: Porno Empire
description: Welcome to a world of bold decisions and sweet temptations! Porno Empire [18+] is an adult visual novel that will transport you into a captivating realm of luxurious opportunities and enticing choices.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh PokéDuel
description: This game is a mod for Pokemon Fire Red which replaces all the pokemon with iconic Yu-Gi-Oh monsters and includes pokemon mechanics up to gen 9.

name: Packed to the Gills
description: Deep-sea train-catching simulator made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 54!

name: Urban Flow: Back to School Edition
description:
Become one with the flow. The Urban Flow!

This bundle includes base game, Expansion Pack, London Rules and Streets Supplement.

name: Tenshi-tachi no Gogo III: Bangai-hen
description:
The second Bangai-hen (a side story) in the Tenshitachi no Gogo series is set in the same environment and features recurrent characters from Tenshitachi no Gogo 3: Ribbon. The protagonist is a high-school student, who also happens to be the brother of Haru Okamoto, the main love interest in Ribbon. Like in most other games in this series, the story revolves around the main character's effort to have sex with every female character, including school mates and colleagues in part-time jobs.

The gameplay is identical to the one in Ribbon or in the previous Bangai-hen: the player proceeds through still screens, typically depleting the available menu commands (verbs and object sub-menus) until a new command appears or an event is triggered. Like in most other games in the series, there are multiple dead ends and possible actions that lead to premature end of the game.

name: Fun Chess: Premium Edition
description:
Choose one of the heros and challenge other players in this family-friendly version of Chess. Thanks to the cartoony graphics, this variation can be enyojed by people of all ages.

This bundle includes the Ghost and Elf DLCs.

name: Farm Land: Complete Edition
description:
Start your farming adventure! Take care of the plants, watch them grow and harvest the crops!
Your quest is simple... sow the seeds, harvest the crops, sell your products to the merchants and expand your farm to become the best farmer you can be!

name: Knights & Guns: Gold Edition
description: This bundle includes base game, Expansion Pack #1 and Armor Pack #1.

name: Knights & Guns: Prime Edition
description:
This bundle includes base game, Expansion Pack #2 and Armor Pack #1 with:
- 10 new levels for you to bring back the peace
- 7 new armors to help you on your quest
- New enemies for that extra little kick

name: Noisz Re: Collection G
description: Noisz Re: Collection G is a massive all-in-one collection of Noisz content, featuring 40 action-packed stages and 3 story campaigns which mix the visual novel format with intense rhythm battles! It's time to face the music like never before.

name: All Elite Wrestling: Fight Forever - Hookhausen: Very Handsome, Very Evil Pack
description: Expand your AEW playable roster with Hook and his ally Danhausen.

name: Cat's Cosmic Atlas: Deluxe Edition
description:
Embrace the wonders of the night sky alongside an adorable kitten named Fellie.
Gaze upon the stars and other celestial bodies. Cat’s Cosmic Atlas takes you through the Southern and Northern skies. Experience the most beautiful sights and learn a thing or two about the vast Universe that surrounds us.

name: Comic Coloring Book: Complete Edition - Paint Special
description:
Many adventures await!
Once upon a time, two children, a boy, and a girl found two unique toys - a robot and an alpacorn. These magically came to life to become our heroes' best friends! Together they experience amazing stories about friendship, helping others, and the joy of life!

This bundle lets you try out the new whiteboard set and drawings.

name: Cooking Arena: 7 in 1 Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Tenshi-tachi no Gogo III: Ribbon
description:
The third game in the Tenshitachi no Gogo series is not connected to its predecessors story-wise. In this installment, the player assumes the role of a male teacher in a high school. Many pretty female students (and pretty female teachers) surround the hero, but he only has one girl in mind: Haru Okamoto, whom he calls "his angel". In order to win her love, the hero will have to know her better - which also means knowing the secrets of students and teachers alike...

Tenshitachi no Gogo 3: Ribbon is a Japanese-style (puzzle-less) adventure game. The player interacts with the environment by choosing verb commands ("Look", "Ask", "Search", etc.), which lead to sub-menus with object choices. The game mostly advances in a linear way, but at certain points the story can end prematurely, depending on the player's choice.

name: Dateless Love: Love Story Behind the Restoration
description:
Time slipped during a school trip in Kyoto,
it is a love game at the end of Edo period with handsome guys.

name: Dark American Horror Stories
description: Discover American horror stories that fuse the unexplained and the sinister in haunting settings, revealing the dark secrets of American society.

name: Persona 5 Tactica: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Triple Threat Edition includes:

• Base Game
• Limited Edition Bonus - Raoul Picaro
• P5T: Repaint Your Heart Challenge Pack
• P5T: Weapon Pack
• P5T: Picaro Summoning Pack

name: Persona 5 Tactica: Picaro Summoning Pack + Raoul Persona
description: Sin descripción

name: Persona 5 Tactica: Repaint Your Heart Challenge Pack
description:
Rise up and take on a new test with the Repaint Your Heart Challenge Pack! Features new game rules, two additional characters, and new battles with dynamic stages.

P5T Repaint Your Heart Challenge Pack includes:
- Access to Goro and Kasumi
- All-new details in the Report information within the main game
- Unlocks brutal Challenge Stages with exclusive clear conditions
- Adds unique unit formations to subsequent playthroughs

name: Persona 5 Tactica: Weapon Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Tenshi-tachi no Gogo Collection
description:
"Tenshi-tachi no Gogo Collection" contains three games, which are remakes of the first three entries in the Tenshi-tachi no Gogo series.
The remade versions were not released separately.

All the three games have updated graphics (some scenes were completely re-drawn), as well as interface changes. There is no text input and all the three remakes have a similar verb-based menu interface. The menus have been simplified, with less choices than in the original versions, removing most of the "useless" command combinations.

name: Pinball FX: South Park Pinball
description: It’s South Park, pinball style! Join Cartman, Stan, Kyle, Kenny and Butters in these totally sweet pinball adventures!

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Ninja Runner
description: A ninja never stops training.

name: S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope - Aniversary Edition
description: This bundle includes base game, Expansion Pack and Target Acquired.

name: Speediest: Car Racing Formula & Auto Sport
description: Rev up your engines and get ready for the ultimate racing experience in Speediest - Car Racing Formula & Auto Sport! Choose your path in the fast-paced world of motorsport as you take on the challenges of Formula and Autosport racing.

name: Zombies Wars
description: "Zombies Wars" is a shooting game.The terrifying zombie shooter game immerses players into places infested with horrifying zombies.

name: You Are Liam: Shadow Memories
description: You have done some things you're not proud of. Now you must enter your own mind to come to terms with the things you've done. Loop around rooms, solve puzzles and hide from different monsters as you uncover your own truth.

name: World war zombie
description: WorldWArZombie - another zombie game but with several maps and several fun and devastating accessories, only for real gamers

name: Worldcrusher
description: Travel in space and scrap other planets to rebuild your own homeworld in this simple clicker RPG.

name: Wipe Girls
description: Players will play as a bounty hunter and live and work in the city of dreams. Because of a chance commission, unveiled his revenge journey. This game has a total of four female characters on the scene.In addition to their apparent identities, there are other secrets hidden behind them.

name: Who is Abby
description: You play as Tom, searching for his missing sister in this stunning first-person walking sim meets point-and-click adventure. A psychological thriller where you unravel a mystery through exploration and puzzle-solving—no horror, just suspense and intrigue as you reveal more about her disappearance.

name: Whispers Of Aether
description: Embark on an epic journey: Create, lead, and protect your organization, while facing perilous creatures in the mystical realm of Aether. Craft, manage, explore, and purge the land of evil.

name: VR SecretRoom
description: Alone with a girl in a closed VR space. Let her do what she likes. At first she seems to reject you, but As you progress through her game, she will gradually become more obedient.

name: Until The Last Bullet
description: Until The Last Bullet is a unique combination of an FMV and rail-shooter game in which you navigate the winding halls of an abandoned factory, eliminating waves of bloodthirsty mutants.

name: Whispering Fears
description: A story about a game designer seeking to use artificial intelligence for the purpose of crafting an exceptional narrative within a game, until something unexpected happens.

name: The No-Name Project
description: Welcome to 'The No-Name Project,' where limitless freedom awaits! Adopt various characters, from animals to NPCs, even resurrecting them with necromancy. Explore, mine, and interact with the world's secrets. Frequent updates ensure endless adventures!

name: The Ruins
description: If you’re reading this I apologize. I will not reach an October release date, unfortunately my SSD containing all the game files for both the ruins and jumpah has failed. This is a very tough time for me I will try my best to get back on track. Thank you.

name: Throw Anything: Radiation Zombies
description: Complete missions to save a world devastated by zombies, utilizing Arm Units and special abilities! Throw Anything: Radiation Zombies is a third-person shooter 3D-action roguelite game set in a world overrun by zombies, where you survive by throwing objects around. Equip a powerful Arm Unit, enhance yourself with a personalized skill tree, and explore a maze-like world!

name: The Witches Story
description: The Witches Story is a visual novel for adults only. Eric, an ordinary man who has always laughed at tales about witches, finds himself in the center of the witches' magical world. He gets to meet the witches, get to know them from a different side and in different poses.

name: The Skyland Chronicles
description: You are a bloody pirate. Will you make the most of it in the new world and fulfill your destiny? This is your battle, where you'll come face to face with dark creatures from Slavic mythology. Take on the role of a legendary warrior and decide if the world is worth saving.

name: T.I.M.E
description: T.I.M.E is a First-Person, Arena, Boomer Shooter that pits players against each other in a one-on-one contest. Players compete in a round-based first to 3 wins system that is balanced through time rewinding set by the round loser to balance the scales of skill against strategy.

name: Tracks of the Arcana
description: A tarot-inspired adventure game where you travel the cosmos with your magical train, fighting enemies and crafting resources, all while drawing tarot cards that shape your destiny.

name: Tower Defense 3D Fusion
description: A unique and modern take on the tower defense genre.

name: Tower of Fire: The Sword of Unspoken Misc
description: Tower of Fire: The Sword of Unspoken Misc is two hour story-heavy adventure game with a strong Power Metal aesthetic.

name: Tomb Of AnuBI0S
description: Tomb of AnuBI0S is an unique 2D tower defense-platformer with an Egyptian Sci-fi setting. Defend the AI deity RAm from waves of undead "Organics." Upgrade your arsenal from weapons to walls, turrets, and your player capabilities. Immerse yourself in meticulously crafted levels and defend RAm!

name: Toi 2 Attack
description: Emperor Zaroc's forces invaded the planet Toi destroy the boss and regain control of the planet

name: TNMverse VIP
description: TNMverse VIP is an online multiplayer battle royale Game

name: Tmutarakan
description: A visual novel about the adventures of the young prince Oleg, the steppe princess Maryam, and the warrior Ivan on their journey to Tmutarakan.

name: Trespasser
description: A child who is home alone is about to experience their biggest fear of all time: someone breaking into their house with no one to contact for help. Will you be able to survive until the parents come back home?

name: Egyptian Myth
description: An excellent large Egyptian temple themed map that will keep you in the action almost the whole time.

name: Fearcraft
description: Three small-medium sized levels that are almost a horror Hexen2 theme. The setting is a dark fantasy castle showing hints of industrial growth, built upon terrain and cliffs, and disappearing into the void.

name: The Looming Madness
description: Large egyptian map with a unique mix of textures. Features a few custom monsters such as the SOA goblin and the Snakeman.

name: Brumal Quest
description: Large snowy medieval village, using Daikatana and Hexen2 textures, and coming with snow-themed monster skins.

name: Ultramarine
description: Ultramarine is a blue gothic/industrial level using modified Quake3 textures. It takes the medieval/castle theme to another height in originality blue panels and light grey concrete brick. A trademark twisting layout that weaves through this large level as you enter and eventually exit the castle in a tough end battle. Custom monsters come included with Axeman, Gremlins, Rocket and Nail Ogres and the tough Baron gang

name: Nihilore: The Mechanical Empire
description: Nihilore is a dark industrial two-map nightmare using a strong mix of custom textures. This Mechanical Empire is brought to life with rusting metal beams and buttresses holding together a brown brick city.

name: Necrobrood
description: Necrobrood is a three map pack with new monsters, textures and skins. The theme follows on from Permutations of the Rotten with a very dark and morbid metal style using grotty brownish modified ID textures.

name: Speedmap Snack Pack
description: Episode of 14 smallish speedmap-like levels in varying themes. The maps are based on the Copper mod (included) and there is a custom music track.

name: Speedmap Snack Pack 2: Cosmic Hunger
description: Speedmap jam pack of 19 levels from 21 authors organized into 3 episodes, all made within 48 hours. Mappers could choose from 4 themes (Cr8 base, Egypt, Firetop Mountain, or Knave) with specific weapon progressions. Most maps range from small to medium sized, and can be played from shotgun start if desired.

name: Love: Spice!
description:
Love: Spice! is an otome/dating sim game created in two weeks for My First Game Jam: Summer 2023.

In a world where everybody (yes, everybody) is some kind of spice, a regular black pepper, weighed down by the mundanities of life, engages in an interesting hobby to destress: people -- no, spice watching. In a completely respectful manner, of course. It's always cathartic to see hot men just existing. But at some point, these men have begun to take an interest in our unassuming little black pepper! And maybe, just maybe, it'll develop into something more...

name: Sinister 625
description: Community mapping event in celebration of Quake's 25th anniversary: nine large levels in varying themes + a starting hub, all following the "625" rule of using only six different textures (6 for June), featuring two surprises and five enemy types (2 and 5 for 25 years of Quake).

name: Guncotton
description: Guncotton is an industrial/base styled two map pack (and start map). Architecturally very detailed, the maps are woven in modified Q2 Waste textures (MXoxide) and Than's Industrial set.

name: Re:Mobilize
description:
Re:Mobilize is a brand-new single-player Quake modification by EmeraldTiger and Inky that introduces three new movement-based mechanics to the game, opening up devious new challenges to players and a whole new dimension of possibilities for level designers.
Trampolines: Perform death-defying leaps of faith across even the most intimidating gaps and chasms.
Wiremeshes: Nothing can stop you, not even gravity itself. More than just simple ladders, these surfaces let you move up, down, sideways, and even hang from ceilings.
Lighthooks and Lightpanels: The lighthook's purely photonic composition allows it to instantly latch onto any visible lightpanel, regardless of distance. You'll be hooked in no time - literally.

name: The King's Wish
description:
It has been a hundred days since your father, the king, passed away. You have spent a hundred days in your high tower with the knight who ended his life, and who has sworn to end yours as well.

It's time to make a choice.

name: Rusty Barrel
description:
Rusty barrel is a short horror game in which you pilot a small, cramped and old submarine. You have to move through narrow openings in gorges on the ocean floor.

The game was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 54 on the theme "Limited Space". Inspired by the game Iron lung.

name: VanimateApp
description: VanimateApp is a 3D, Real-Time, Physics-Based Character Sim. You can sexually interact with characters of all shapes and sizes using toys and other fun stuff. Play in First- and Third-person perspectives with fully physics-based gameplay and complete control.

name: Imomushi
description: This is not "The Great Adventure of the Cute Caterpillar."

name: Cog: The Rogue Machine
description: Discover the secrets of a mysterious machine and the corporation excavating it for its precious resources in this rocket-fueled roguelike platformer!

name: Algor Pew Pew
description: One day, invaders from the other world attacked and kidnapped all ARPs. Your mission is to travel through parallel worlds, enjoy the rhythms, rescue the ARPs and survive until end. Let us dive you into the first rogue-lite survival game from Algorhythm Project.

name: A.I.Liens
description: A.I.LIENS - A 3rd Person Shooter RPG with Advanced A.I., Abilities, Player Stats, Inventory, Loot, Dialogue, Interaction, Firearms, Melee Weapons, Weapon Upgrades, Save/Load and much more

name: Aeterna Noctis: Virtuoso
description: Aeterna Noctis: Virtuoso is a boss rush mode that allows players to face the bosses they already defeated during the base game, but includes new difficulty modes, combat patterns, and behavior!

name: Adult Puzzle: My Pretty Neighbor Chloe
description: You should meet Chloe.Are you feeling stressed? Don't worry.I'm here to help you relax and brighten up your day with a classic puzzle game!

name: Abyss School
description: Solve hidden items and puzzles while avoiding abyssal zombies and traps at school.

name: 3D Puzzle: Harbor
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful place.

name: 3D Puzzle: Building
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful place.

name: Abandoned Dark
description: The game is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements where you play as a chick trying to go through dark depth. You need to go through different levels along the way, destroying enemies in the location and avoiding traps.

name: Aerial Nature Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 3
description: Elevate your puzzle-solving journey to new heights as you explore Earth's wonders from above with this expansion.

name: Amazin' Mage
description: amazin' Mage is a top-down, randomly generated dungeon crawler with crafting and with excellent replay value!

name: Arcane Blast
description: Arcane Blast is a fast-paced, action-packed roguelike brimming with sorcery. Master the seven elements, combine them to achieve powerful reactions and face swarms of enemies to help feline Mage Adrian find his way home from a time dungeon.

name: Virtuar Z
description: A sci-fi Third Person Shooter with a background in the Indonesian city of Jakarta in the future, city full of conflict, Neo Jakarta 2150 once familiar city of Jakarta has been destroyed by civil war, The law of the jungle applies.

name: Unispies: Chapter 1 - Havana Cuba
description: A group of smart, latin american, attractive female hackers steal 2 billion of bitcoin from a communist dictator. Then their lives and family are targeted by the dictator for that crime. The team of girls are rescued by Omar, an ex Mi-6 British agent who runs the Spies for Hire team called Unico.

name: Undead Uprising
description: "Undead Uprising" immerses you in a post-apocalyptic world swarming with zombies. Battle through endless waves of the undead. Continuously evolving, the game offers regular updates and fresh content. The fate of humanity rests in your hands. Are you ready?

name: Ukemeowy
description: In the world of Ukemeowy, you play as an ukulele player, you can mix and match chords to your liking and create the tune you like. Enjoy the vast green scenery as you play the ukulele to your heart's content.

name: Tsugunohi: A Voice from Yesteryear
description: "Tsugunohi -A Voice from Yesteryear-" is one of the most popular titles in the "Tsugunohi" series. The game features a new route that can only be released after the game is cleared. In this realistic recreation of Japan's old-fashioned countryside, a number of terrifying events attack a young girl.

name: Tuzaq
description: Tuzaq is a non-linear visual novel in the genre of adventure.A sweet story about a cruel girl. Or... is it a cruel story that has disfigured a sweet girl?

name: The Shadow of the Evil Tower
description: This is a platform action game with various traps and tons of levels for players to challenge!

name: The Fourth Sense Evolution: Stone Age
description: Top View, 2D, Evolution, Survival, and Cult game. "Be a God, Evolve Followers, and Spread Your Faith: A Stone Age Sandbox Game"

name: The Dark Whispers
description: The Dark Whispers is a chilling descent into madness, a haunting tale of one detective's relentless pursuit of the truth. Will you brave the darkness and uncover the horrifying secrets that lie hidden within, or will you become just another lost soul in its malevolent embrace?

name: The InVincible Iron Ivy: Enter the Pretty, Pretty Princess
description: This game is a Soulslike Role-playing game that uses a progress system (“leveling system”) for measuring players’ rates of success. This version of the game is a single-player mode-only game.

name: The Cauldron Kids: The Summoning of Mr. Vermicelli
description: The Cauldron Kids is a pixel art short narrative RPG about two kid witches on their way to magical mischief and plushie bewitching, combining quirky and sweet dialogues and minigames. Featuring the small and cozy chalet the characters live in, players discover soon that the Cauldron Kids’ home is full of magical and playful surprises.

name: The Carrier and Crows
description: Crows have downed your plane and you are trapped at the far end of a remote peninsula in northern British Columbia. You must craft the necessary tools to contend with the local eccentrics and find your way back to civilization.

name: Telluria: Forebodings Gear Minigame - Final Stage
description: A puzzle-solving stage involving objects crafting and inventory use

name: Stolen Memories II
description: The emptiness of the chosen path entangles souls, preventing them from moving forward. The quiet, unbearably gentle withering continues, and only hope can stop it. Only hope can bring the smile to her face once more. "Stolen Memories" a non-linear visual novel with multiple endings.

name: Surf Park
description: A surfing game focused on smooth carving turns and realistic airs.

name: Supermurgitroid
description: Faced with difficult, or sometimes impossible, 2d platforming challenges, spend your precious time limit to alter the level. Well actually pay someone else to do it. Then try to traverse through the modified level in the time you left yourself.

name: Super 10 Pin
description: Strike your way through a wild world of bowling in Super 10 Pin! Use special abilities to jump, boost, and explode your way down unbelievable N64-styled bowling lanes in this wacky arcade bowling game!

name: Suns of Wiraqocha
description: Help the God Wiraqocha to recover all the stolen suns that have been hidden in different dimensions, which you can access through the Great Gate of the Sun, to return light to the Milky Way.

name: Sunken Ships
description: Explore a little seaside coast of submerged ruins, sunken ships and lonely islands.

name: Super RPS
description: Super RPS is a tactical strategy game in which two players have a series of Rock, Paper, Scissors matches on 5 fields concurrently. Each player has a secondary deck of "Field Cards" that have special abilities that can turn the match in your favor.

name: Surrogate
description: Visit a surreal world and help a blue girl navigate the perils of paranoia and the intrusion of mysterious beings in her life...

name: Sweet Dreams
description: Your soul are chosen! Face off with great 6 very different from each other bosses! Use excellent weapons to beat enemies, discover secrets, solve puzzles and buy things from the shop of Wizar!

name: Team of Bravery
description: Team of Bravery is an action roguelike dungeon crawler Team RPG adventure game.Gather your team ,Level up your Team members and Exploring dangerous Dungeons.Survirve and Loot legendary Items and Treasure ~Fight your way out in the Greatest Adventure!
